reviews.name: Kfir Shapira
reviews.review: Unbelievable how easy it is to display all of your reviews on your own website using ReputationAllOver Widget! 5 stars tool!

reviews.name: Kfir Shapira
reviews.review: This tool gives your prospects a visual sense about how much other users love your website, makes your site stand out from the crowd in organic search, and It`s highly recommended for anyone who has an online website for promoting his business. And the implementation of the widget was smooth and super simple
